snippet.title: Anno 2205 Game Play Trailer [US]
snippet.description:
The beloved city-builder takes off into space!  Bring your futuristic city to life with over a million thriving citizens, churning factories, grinding mines, and amazing wildlife, offering unlimited building. 

Raise Your City – Anno’s masterful economic gameplay is back, taking strategic city-building simulation to new heights in the biggest Anno ever. 

Develop Your Resources – Secure the prosperity of your people by controlling multiple locations on Earth and on the moon.

Race to space – Colonize continents on Earth, establish bases on the Moon, and mine the Moon’s resources to transform your cities into thriving metropolises.

Visit annogame.com for details!
